extracted_playbook.title: Update Account Passwords

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Multifactor Authentication
extracted_playbook.description: Implement multifactor authentication on domain registrar accounts, or on other systems used to modify DNS records.

extracted_playbook.title: Audit Public DNS Records
extracted_playbook.description: Audit public DNS records to verify they are resolving to the intended location.

extracted_playbook.title: Revoke Fraudulent Encryption Certificates
extracted_playbook.description: Search for encryption certificates related to domains and revoke any fraudulently requested certificates.
